definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Did their parents check up on their whereabouts and set curfews?
sentences.chinese: 他们的父母会调查他们的行踪并实施宵禁吗？

sentences.english: Danger looming, Mao Buddha who has discovered the whereabouts of Smith.
sentences.chinese: 危险在步步逼近，茅迦人已经发现了史密斯的行踪。

sentences.english: Her present whereabouts is still nameless.
sentences.chinese: 她目前的行踪仍然不明。

sentences.english: Occasionally someflamewould come pursuit of her errant swain.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔也有情人追来寻找她行踪飘忽的情郎。

sentences.english: After a time the enemy was baying across all south Kiangsi, hunting for the elusive Reds.
sentences.chinese: 不久以后，敌人就在赣南到处追逐行踪不定的红军。

sentences.english: The question is whether he is alive or dead. There is no trace of him.
sentences.chinese: 问题是是他是生还是死我们无从得知他的行踪。

sentences.english: In the end is what leaked Chang's whereabouts?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什么东西泄露了张锡铭的行踪？

sentences.english: No clue to his whereabouts has been found.
sentences.chinese: 至今没有找到有关他行踪的线索。

sentences.english: Her present whereabouts is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 她目前的行踪仍然不明。

sentences.english: For example, how to kill that elusive deer?
sentences.chinese: 例如，如何杀死行踪迷离的鹿？

sentences.english: Left cold zen have received yue not the cluster to luoyang gold knife the wangs movements.
sentences.chinese: 左冷禅还收到了岳不群去洛阳金刀王家的行踪。

sentences.english: You can't find him, he is a bird of passage.
sentences.chinese: 你打找不到他，他是一行踪不定的人。

sentences.english: He is wondering of Yeongaryo's whereabout.
A suspicious husband hired a private eye to check on the movements of his wife.
sentences.chinese: 有位多疑的老公雇了个私家侦探，调查老婆的行踪。

sentences.english: But the chances of seeing these elusive clouds are increasing.
sentences.chinese: 但是观察这一行踪不定的云层的机会正在增加。

sentences.english: His whereabouts are uncertain – he could be living anywhere.

definition: inside information/the ins and outs of the matter/how things stand/what's up
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
lit. beat the grass to scare the snake (idiom)/fig. to inadvertently alert an enemy/to punish sb as a warning to others
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
lit. spider's thread and horse track/tiny hints (of a secret)/traces/clue
